text: Ricardo Pepi (born January 9, 2003) is an American soccer player who plays as a forward for FC Dallas. == Career == === North Texas SC === In the first game in North Texas SC’s history, Pepi scored a hat-trick to lead the team to a 3-2 win over the Chattanooga Red Wolves. Since Pepi's hat-trick against Chattanooga, he continued his scoring streak. He was one of the top scorers in the league, scoring 7 goals in 6 appearances. === FC Dallas === One June 11, 2019, Pepi was called up to FC Dallas on a short-term loan deal ahead of Dallas' U.S. Open Cup match against USL Championship club OKC Energy FC. He debuted for Dallas playing the full 90 minutes against the Energy, but without scoring. On June 21, 2019, Pepi signed a homegrown contract with FC Dallas, becoming the 26th homegrown signing for the club. ==International career== Pepi was called up to youth camps at for both the United States U17s and Mexico U17s.
